name: Memory • Classic
description:
Memory Classic is a game of memorization skills, designed for the entire family and suitable for people of all ages.
It is inspired by the popular game of pairs where the player requires concentration and memory.

 In this version for iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch, the game is composed of 5 difficulty levels and each comes with 5 levels, where images are shuffled and placed face down on the screen. The player must discover two pictures (animals or food theme), letters (you can choose upper or lower case), or numbers whether these form a pair disappear, otherwise, are again covered and remittances in their original location on the screen.

The aim is to guess all pairs as quickly as possible. Faster you will be more up your score will be. You can compare yourself to friends or other players on Apple Game Center.


Train your memory with this simple memory game and have fun !

- Memory is a free game
- Memory is supported on all iOS devices (iPad iPhone and iPod Touch)
- Memory has a unique and addictive Gameplay
- Memory let you add new card sets (Word, Images, Letters, Numbers, etc…)
- Memory is connected to Apple Game Center to share and compare Highscore all over the world
- Memory support English, Spanish and French languages

Try it, it is free.
